scripts.twill-build: rm -f public/hot && npm run twill-copy-blocks && cd vendor/area17/twill && npm ci && npm run prod && cp -R public/* ${INIT_CWD}/public
scripts.twill-copy-blocks: npm run twill-clean-blocks && mkdir -p resources/assets/js/blocks/ && cp -R resources/assets/js/blocks/ vendor/area17/twill/frontend/js/components/blocks/customs/
